channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for AK
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for AK

item.title: Report I-2024080051
item.description:
Report I-2024080051

Identified by scraper @ 2024-08-23T15:14:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-23
  • City: Anchorage
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Water
  • Carrier/Reporter: TOTE MARITIME ALASKA, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On July 23,2024, TAG inspected trailer MCKZ550219, booking SEA 1040763. This load sailed NB on the North Star voyage 24115 that departed Tacoma on 7/19/2024. Upon inspecting it, TAG found an undeclared hazardous item of 1 box of UN 1090 Acetone Class flammable liquid not marked as limited quantity. The trailer was placarded as limited quantity and should have been placarded as Class 3. This item not being manifested could cause the trailer to be stowed not according to the proper segregation requirements. The trailer sailed with undeclared hazardous material inside and was stowed on the Vessel.

item.description:
Report X-2024081256

  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: X-2024081256, X-2024081259: Xray showed a couple of suspected batteries and hazmat items to confirm did a secondary screen. Physical search was done found 1 extremely flammable liquid and 2 Lithium Ion Batteries (one installed in equipment. Flammable liquid 440ml 2 Lithium Ion Batteries x 26Wh

item.title: Report I-2024080033
item.description:
Report I-2024080033

Identified by scraper @ 2024-08-19T21:12:43+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-07-07
  • City: Anchorage
  • State: AK
  • Report Type: Undeclared Shipment with no Release
  • Mode Of Transportation: Air
  • Carrier/Reporter: TOTE MARITIME ALASKA, LLC
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Total Amount Of Damages: 0
  • Serious Incident Ind: No
  • Description: On July 7,2024, TAG inspected trailer V 007194, booking SEA 1038246. This load sailed NB on the Midnight Sun voyage 24105 that departed Tacoma on 7/3/2024. Upon inspecting it, TAG found undeclared hazardous items of 6 cylinders of UN 1978 Propane class 2.1 fiammable gas. These items were not manifest and the trailer sailed with undeclared hazardous material inside on the Vessel.
